title: NFT Preview Card Component
content: The NFT Preview card component UI was created entirely with HTML and CSS.

title: QR Code Component
content: QR code component created solely with HTML and CSS. The user interface was designed in a stylish, modern look.

title: MovieSpace
content: The MovieSpace website was built using ReactJS, which uses IMDB API to fetch using a search query using user input. reactjs and imdb api to fetch data and display results.

title: Task Manager
content: Task Manager is a application that was built using nodejs, expressjs, and mongodb. The application is used to create, read, update, and delete tasks.
